section.title: Configure /etc/ldap.conf Settings
section.para: Verify that the indicated lines are contained in the /etc/ldap.conf file.

listitem.para: GEN008020 - If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS connection must require the server provide a certificate with a valid trust path to a trusted CA.
GEN008040 - If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the system must verify the LDAP server's certificate has not been revoked.
List of setting (one per line, "NAME VALUE")
